member.name: ISpatialAudioClient.ActivateSpatialAudioStream
member.summary: Activates and initializes spatial audio stream using one of the spatial audio stream activation structures.
member.param: The structure defining the activation parameters for the spatial audio stream. The vt field should be set to VT_BLOB and the blob field should be populated with a or a .
The UUID of the spatial audio stream interface to activate.
A pointer to the pointer which receives the activated spatial audio interface.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: ISpatialAudioClient.GetMaxDynamicObjectCount
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of dynamic audio objects for the spatial audio client.
member.param: Gets the maximum dynamic object count for this client.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: ISpatialAudioClient.GetMaxFrameCount
member.summary: Gets the maximum possible frame count per processing pass. This method can be used to determine the size of the source buffer that should be allocated to convey audio data for each processing pass.
member.param: The audio format used to calculate the maximum frame count. This should be the same format specified in the ObjectFormat field of the passed to .
The maximum number of audio frames that will be processed in one pass.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: ISpatialAudioClient.GetNativeStaticObjectTypeMask
member.summary: Gets a channel mask which represents the subset of static speaker bed channels native to current rendering engine.
member.param: A bitwise combination of values from the enumeration indicating a subset of static speaker channels. The values returned will only include the static channel values and will not include AudioObjectType_Dynamic.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: ISpatialAudioClient.GetStaticObjectPosition
member.summary: Gets the position in 3D space of the specified static spatial audio channel.
member.param: A value indicating the static spatial audio channel for which the position is being queried. This method will return E_INVALIDARG if the value does not represent a static channel, including AudioObjectType_Dynamic and AudioObjectType_None.
The x coordinate of the static audio channel, in meters, relative to the listener. Positive values are to the right of the listener and negative values are to the left.
The y coordinate of the static audio channel, in meters, relative to the listener. Positive values are above the listener and negative values are below.
The z coordinate of the static audio channel, in meters, relative to the listener. Positive values are behind the listener and negative values are in front.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, possible return codes include, but are not limited to, the values shown in the following table.

listheader.description: The supplied value does not represent a static channel.

member.name: ISpatialAudioClient.GetSupportedAudioObjectFormatEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an that contains all supported audio formats for spatial audio objects, the first item in the list represents the most preferable format.
member.param: Pointer to the pointer that receives the interface.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: ISpatialAudioClient.IsAudioObjectFormatSupported
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether supports a the specified format.
member.param: The format for which support is queried.
member.returns: If the specified format is supported, it returns S_OK. If specified format is unsupported, this method returns AUDCLNT_E_UNSUPPORTED_FORMAT.

member.name: ISpatialAudioClient.IsSpatialAudioStreamAvailable
member.summary: When successful, gets a value indicating whether the currently active spatial rendering engine supports the specified spatial audio render stream.
member.param: The interface ID of the interface for which availability is queried.
A structure containing additional information to be used when support is queried. For more information, see Remarks.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, possible return codes include, but are not limited to, the values shown in the following table.

listheader.description: The specified stream interface can't be activated by the currently active rendering engine.
The metadata format supplied in the auxiliaryInfo parameter is not supported by the current rendering engine. For more information, see Remarks..

member.name: ISpatialAudioClient
member.summary: The ISpatialAudioClient interface enables a client to create audio streams that emit audio from a position in 3D space. This interface is a part of Windows Sonic, Microsoft’s audio platform for more immersive audio which includes integrated spatial sound on Xbox and Windows.
